text: (ivarkalukku) munniruntavarkalum (avarkal virumpiyavaru nam kotutta) attatcikalai poyyakki vittanar enra karanattait tavira, (ippotullavarkal korum) attatcikalai anuppivaikka veronrum namakku tataiyaka illai.
